modName: (Reuploaded) Daenerys Targaryen from Game of Thrones - Standalone Follower Mod - DELETED
summary: I wasn't able to upload any files, the uploading process of the attachment never ended, so I decided to upload the update into another mod page. This mods adds my (fixed) standalone follower, Daenerys Targaryen, from the TV show Game of Thrones.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/p0e9VSI.png[/img]﻿﻿

[img]https://i.imgur.com/L8qGbCd.png[/img][/size]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img]

[size=3][i]This is my second serious standalone follower.[/i][i]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79370/]First standalone companion HERE.
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79454/]Second standalone companion HERE.
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84105/]Third standalone companion HERE (Khal Drogo).[/url]

[u]You can add screenshots! I'll be waiting yours.

[/u][/i][i][u][img]http://image.prntscr.com/image/8b4cece25815466abda6ca557ba9c853.png[/img][/u][/i][/size]

*Note: English is not my native language, I'll do my best to explain you all about this mod.


[size=6]► [color=#8e7cc3]INFORMATION [/color]◄[/size]
[i][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]
[size=3]
Daenerys is the only daughter and youngest child of King Aerys II Targaryen, the "Mad King", and his sister-wife, Rhaella Targaryen. Is the younger sister of Rhaegar Targaryen and Viserys Targaryen. Her father died during the Sack of King's Landing, before she was even born.[/size]

[i][size=3]This mods adds my standalone follower, Daenerys Targaryen, from the TV show Game of Thrones.[/size][/i]

[i][size=3]Name: Daenerys Targaryen[/size]
[size=3]Hair Color: White / Light Gray[/size]
[size=3]Eye Color: Solace (Gray-Blue)[/size]
[size=3]Essential: Yes[/size]
[size=3]Level: Levels with PC[/size]
[size=3]Combat Style: Melee-Assassin[/size]
[size=3]Inventory list: x2 Daedric Daggers[/size]
[size=3]Spells: None

Body - UNP
Skin - Fair Skin

She can be found inside Dragonsreach (Whiterun), ready to follow you.
[/size][/i]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/reelO1T.png[/img]
[i][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/epBkPjM.jpg[/img]﻿

[i][size=4]** Dragonsreach (Whiterun) **[/size][/i]


[i][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/aQdbGCp.png[/img]
[size=3][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img]
[/size]
[i][i]Kalilies[/i] for the hair.
Bethesda for making this fantastic game.[/i]
[i]Nexus Community for making me possible to share this mod.

[size=5]Check out my other mods & screenshots!
